Others: The Mets lost Game 1 of the NLCS to the Dodgers with a score of 9-0.
Kodai Senga struggled in his start, allowing two runs in the first inning and being removed in the second.
The Mets managed only three hits against Jack Flaherty and Dodgers relievers.
Sean Manaea is expected to start Game 2 for the Mets against a bullpen game for the Dodgers.
